article.headline: Fresno State 85, Winston-Salem 63
article.story: FRESNO, Calif. (AP) -- Ja'Vance Coleman scored 20 points to lead five players in double figures as Fresno State opened the season with an 85-63 victory over Winston-Salem State on Friday night. Quinton Hosley, Dominic McGuire, Shawn Taylor and Kevin Bell scored 12 points each for Fresno State. McGuire added 11 rebounds and Bell had nine assists -- both game highs. Jamal Durham scored 16 points and Norman Carter added 11 for the Rams, who are playing their first season in Division I. Fresno State shot 50 percent from the field compared to 31.3 percent for undersized Winston-Salem State. The Bulldogs dominated from start to finish, getting 18 points from Coleman in the first half on 6-of-6 shooting from three-point range. Fresno State made its first five shots, including two Coleman three-pointers, to go ahead 13-3. Coleman continued his barrage, hitting three more from beyond the stripe, as the lead grew to 24-7 with 13:43 remaining. The Bulldogs led by as many as 30 points in the first half before their outside shooting cooled off. Fresno State used its height advantage inside to grab 47 rebounds compared to 35 for the Rams. The Bulldogs also had 11 blocks, including four apiece by McGuire and Taylor.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
